definition: Given to frolicking; playful

example: He never closes, he's an insomniac !

definition: One who suffers an inability or difficulty sleeping; a sufferer from insomnia.

example: Ornery cuss.
example_meaning: Lão già xấu tính .
definition: the state of being ornery

example: I'd have preferred it if you'd stayed later last night.

definition: (transitive, now dated) To advance, promote (someone). [from 14th c.]

example: It's been years since I've tasted the nectar of the Old South.
example_meaning: Đã một năm rồi tôi chưa được nếm rượu ngon của Phương Nam.
definition: (mythology) The sweet drink of the Ancient gods.

example: Navigator !
example_meaning: Người Dẫn Đường !
definition: (uncountable) Traffic or travel by vessel, especially commercial shipping

example: Reenact one or two experiences.

example: Fine bone china — this is a real classic .
example_meaning: Xương nghiền mịn trong đồ sứ — cái này thật là kinh điển đấy.
definition: Of or relating to the first class or rank, especially in literature or art.

example: Under GAAP there are two kinds of accounts: debit and credit.
example_meaning: Theo GAAP và MAIC có hai loại tài khoản: nợ và có.
definition: A sum of money taken out of an account.

example: What a sick, masochistic lion.
example_meaning: Con sư tử thật bệnh hoạn và thô bạo .
definition: someone who enjoys pain, or who derives pleasure from harming oneself or being harmed by others

example: My logic is undeniable .
example_meaning: Suy luận của tôi rất chặt chẽ .
definition: irrefutable, or impossible to deny

example: I started teaching people how to turn rejections into opportunities.
example_meaning: Tôi bắt đầu dạy mọi người cách biến sự từ chối thành cơ hội.

example: My husband and Laroche have been hatching this plan for a long time.
example_meaning: Chồng tôi và Laroche đã ấp ủ kế hoạch này từ rất lâu rồi.
definition: A horizontal door in a floor or ceiling.

example: After the abdominal cavity had been emptied, it was washed thoroughly.
example_meaning: Sau khi mọi thứ trong bụng đã được lấy ra, ổ bụng được rữa thật kỹ.
definition: A hole or hollow depression.

example: I went to get vaccinated .
example_meaning: Tôi đã đi để được tiêm chủng .

example: Enter Rudimental feat.
example_meaning: Nhập Rudimental feat.

example: Are we to understand the terror is against the government?

definition: The deliberate commission of an act of violence to create an emotional response through the suffering of the victims in the furtherance of a political or social agenda.

example: [Child reads or recites Psalm 83:18.]
example_meaning: [Cháu đọc hoặc đọc thuộc lòng Thi-thiên 83:18].

example: The characters they copied were fictional , but the liquor Allen and his friends drank was real.
example_meaning: Các nhân vật đó đều là hư cấu , nhưng rượu mà Danh cùng bạn mình uống là thật.
definition: Invented, as opposed to real.

example_meaning: Phương pháp này được đề nghị bởi Edward de Bono.
definition: the act of promulgating or announcing something, especially a proclamation announcing a new law.

example: I think it may have been a febrile convulsion.

definition: Feverish, or having a high temperature.

example: One scholar says that the Greek term rendered “resolved” “has the idea of predetermination .”

definition: To determine or decide something in advance.

example: Jane is as clever as any girl in her class.
example_meaning: Jane thông minh như những đứa bé gái khác trong lớp của nó.
definition: smart, intelligent or witty, in the sense of being mentally quick or sharp

example: You will return to face with the sole purpose of winning.
example_meaning: Các con sẽ trở lại với mục đích duy nhất của chiến thằng.
definition: (focus) Alone; exclusively.

example_meaning: Tôi bám vào nó.

example: Get this eyesore out of my showroom.

example: We're becoming desensitized .

example: Command has attempted to list casualties and losses, but information is sketchy .

example: Have you ever heard of a " snipe "?

example: which culminated in a very large work, which I call "The Triptych ."

definition: A picture or series of pictures painted on three tablets connected by hinges.

example: In summation , I think you just got to not do it.

definition: not one

example: Together, we envisage and enact a society
example_meaning: Chung tay, chúng tôi dự tính và tạo dựng một xã hội
definition: To conceive or see something within one's mind. To imagine or envision.

example: This object was made by a hominid ancestor,
example_meaning: Vật này do tổ tiên loài người làm nên
definition: Any primate of the family Hominidae. All the great apes (Humans, chimpanzees, bonobos, gorillas and orangutans).
